Acceptance criteria: No regressions, total tests 610+.

title: Investigate Tactician mirror P1 bias (BUG-002)
description:
BUG-002: Tactician mirror match shows ~36% vs 64% P1 bias in some bare runs. With INIT=75, the first-mover advantage in shifts may be causing this. Run 1000+ Tactician mirror matches to confirm if bias is real or Monte Carlo noise. If real (P1 consistently wins >60%), document the mechanism. If noise (<5pp from 50/50 at N=1000), downgrade to resolved.

Add a targeted test to playtest.test.ts: Tactician mirror N=500, verify P1 win rate 40-60%. Do NOT change engine code.
